name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log

hostname.title: Hostname/IP
hostname.description: The ip or hostname of your target system where glances server is running

port.title: Port
port.description: The port of your target system where glances server is running

updateInterval.title: Update Interval
updateInterval.description: The update interval in milliseconds to update the sensors, ATTENTION values below 1000 may slow down your homebridge or target system

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: A prefix to identify the exposed accessories better

sensors.title: Sensor Plugin
sensors.description: Enables the sensors plugin to be exposed

cpu.title: Enables natural wording for opening and closing garage doors.  Not supported in all countries.  Please note that opening a garage door requires setting a voice pin within the Alexa app.  Defaults to false
cpu.description: Enables the cpu plugin to be exposed

memory.title: Enable Debug Mode
memory.description: Enables the memory plugin to be exposed
